title: Nostro titolo
alert: Fare clic su OK per chiudere.

details.tip2: We would like to let you know that records in LTC wallet are overloaded since registeration increases exponentially. In order to make you have a better trip on CoinToBe platform, we are going to close withdrawal function for a while to maintain the wallet. We will make an announcement right after the maintenance is done.
details.tip3: We apologize for the inconvenience. If you have further question, please let us know by submitting tickets.
details.tip6: Hope you enjoy your trading on cointobe.com!
